test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 07 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f3223cce58628df19bbc

english.explanation: Analyzing the family tree: W is the brother of Q (W # Q). Q is the son of T (Q @ T), and T is the father of Y (Y @ T). Y is the son of M (Y @ M), and M is the mother of K (M % K), who is the mother of L (K % L). Since W is the brother of Q, and Q is the son of T and M (M is the mother of Q), K is the daughter of M and T. Therefore, K is the sister of Q and W. Thus, K is the sister of W.

hindi.explanation: संबंधित व्यक्ति को ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम प्रदत्त व्यंजक के अनुसार परिवार का वृक्ष बनाते हैं: W और Q भाई हैं, Q और T के मध्य बच्चा संबंध है, T और Y के मध्य पिता-पुत्र संबंध है, Y और M के मध्य माँ-बच्चा संबंध है, M और K के मध्य माँ-बच्चा संबंध है। इस प्रकार, K, T की पुत्री है और W, T का पुत्र है। अतः K, W की बहन है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;PEPPER&#39; is coded as 76 and &#39;CUCUMBER&#39; is coded as 86.&nbsp;How will &#39;CAULIFLOWER&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code is the sum of the alphabetical positions of the letters. For example, PEPPER: P(16) + E(5) + P(16) + P(16) + E(5) + R(18) = 76. Similarly, CUCUMBER: C(3) + U(21) + C(3) + U(21) + M(13) + B(2) + E(5) + R(18) = 86. Applying this to CAULIFLOWER: C(3) + A(1) + U(21) + L(12) + I(9) + F(6) + L(12) + O(15) + W(23) + E(5) + R(18) = 125.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला के अनुक्रमांक में बदलकर उनका योग करें। PEPPER = 16+5+16+16+5+18 = 76 और CUCUMBER = 3+21+3+21+13+2+5+18 = 86। इसी प्रकार, CAULIFLOWER = 3+1+21+12+9+6+12+15+23+5+18 = 125।
key_concepts: अक्षरों के स्थानीय मान का योग

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D5.png" style="width: 318px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of incremental changes in shape and orientation. The missing figure should logically follow the established sequence, which is best represented by option 2.

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला के बाद अगली आकृति में नियमित रूप से घूर्णन या घटते-बढ़ते तत्वों का अनुमान लगाने पर यह तीसरे छेद के बाद एक नियमित आकृति का प्रतिरूप होगा।

questions.original_question: If A - B means that A is the father of B, A + B means that A is the mother of B, A &times; B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that Q is the brother of P?

english.explanation: To show Q is the brother of P, R + P × Q means R is the mother of P, and P is the brother of Q. Thus, Q is the brother of P.

hindi.explanation: Q, P का भाई होगा यदि R, P की माँ हो और P, Q का भाई हो। इसलिए R + P × Q सही व्यंजक है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>+ and&nbsp;&divide;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: After swapping '+' and '÷', the equation becomes 6 ÷ 20 + 12 × 7 - 11. Calculating this gives 0.3 + 84 - 11 = 73.3, which is not equal to 70, making the equation incorrect.

hindi.explanation: चिह्न + और ÷ बदलने पर सही समीकरण बनाएं: 6 ÷ 20 + 12 × 7 - 11 = 70 होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term and the sixth term is related to the fifth term.</p>

<p>4 : 84 :: 11 : ? :: 13 : 2379</p>

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. Eccentric (6) < Edacious (4) < Edifice (2) < Effeminate (5) < Effluent (1) < Effleurage (3) < Effulgent (7).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार व्यवस्थित करें: Eccentric (6), Edacious (4), Edifice (2), Effeminate (5), Effluent (1), Effleurage (3), Effulgent (7)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter-cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>XDNC, VGOE, ?, RMQI, PPRK</p>

english.explanation: Each position in the series follows a pattern: First letters decrease by 2 (X→V→T→R→P), second letters increase by 3 (D→G→J→M→P), third letters increase by 1 (N→O→P→Q→R), and fourth letters increase by 2 (C→E→G→I→K). Thus, the missing term is TJPG.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक स्थिति में अक्षरों के अनुक्रम के अनुसार पैटर्न है: पहले अक्षर में -2, दूसरे में +3, तीसरे में +1, चौथे में +2 जोड़ें।

english.explanation: The pattern in the given set (3,13,18) and (29,39,44) is adding 10 and then 5. Applying this to (16,26,31): 16+10=26, 26+5=31.

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.</p>

<p>7, 21, 63, 189, 567, ?</p>

<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>NTRQ, GOIF, ZJZU, SEQJ, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter position follows a pattern: First letters decrease by 7 (N→G→Z→S→L), second letters decrease by 5 (T→O→J→E→Z), third letters decrease by 9 (R→I→Z→Q→H), fourth letters increase by 15 (Q→F→U→J→Y). Resulting in LZHY.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक स्थिति में अक्षरों के अनुक्रम के पैटर्न के अनुसार अगला शब्द LZHY है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>5 and 8</p>

english.explanation: After swapping 5 and 8, the equation becomes 8 × 2 - 5 + 9 ÷ 1 = 16 -5 +9 = 20, which is correct.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D22.png" style="width: 82px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is best embedded in option 2 when considering the exact orientation and composition.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति को बिना घूर्णन के सम्मिलित करने वाला विकल्प सही होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;2&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D28.png" style="width: 232px; height: 114px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, the sum of opposite faces is 7. If 2 is adjacent to 1, 3, 4, and 5, then the opposite face must be 6.

hindi.explanation: पासे के विपरीत फलकों पर संख्याओं का योग 7 होता है। अतः 2 का विपरीत 5 होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D30.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image of the given figure over line AB is best represented by option 4, as it correctly reflects the figure's orientation.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि दी गई आकृति के बाएँ और दाएँ के अनुपात के आधार पर बनेगी।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In a certain code language, health is wealth&#39; is coded as &#39;626&#39;, &#39;exercise regularly&#39; is coded as &#39;89&#39; and &#39;bring good food&#39; is coded as &#39;544&#39;. How will &#39;balanced diet is key&#39; be&nbsp;</span><span style="">coded in that language?</span>

english.explanation: The code for each phrase is determined by concatenating the number of letters in each word. For 'balanced diet is key', the words have 8, 4, 2, and 3 letters respectively, resulting in '8423'.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक शब्द के अक्षरों की संख्या को जोड़कर कूट बनाया गया है। 'balanced' में 8 अक्षर, 'diet' में 4 अक्षर, 'is' में 2 अक्षर और 'key' में 3 अक्षर हैं। इन्हें जोड़कर 8423 प्राप्त होता है।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: The premises 'Some G are U' and 'Some S are U' do not provide sufficient information to conclude 'No S is G' or 'No U is G'. The conclusions contradict the premises.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. कोई भी निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है
hindi.explanation: कथनों में 'कुछ' का प्रयोग है और निष्कर्षों में 'कोई' व्यापक निष्कर्ष लिए गए हैं। तार्किक नियम के अनुसार कुछ कथनों से व्यापक निष्कर्ष नहीं निकल सकते।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the&nbsp;</span><span style="">whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13&nbsp;</span><span style="">- Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting / multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)</span>

english.explanation: For options 1, 3, and 4, the second number is the square of the first number plus 5 (e.g., 18² + 5 = 329). Option 2 uses 16² + 7 = 263, making it the odd one out.

options.value: Only conclusions III and IV follow
Only conclusions II and III follow
Only conclusions I and II follow

english.explanation: The premises do not logically support any of the conclusions. The relationships between 'medicines', 'capsules', 'bangles', and 'toothpastes' do not allow deriving the conclusions.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. कोई भी निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है
hindi.explanation: कथनों में दिए गए रिश्ते के बीच कोई सीधा तार्किक निष्कर्ष निकालना संभव नहीं है। उदाहरण के तौर पर, कथन में 'कुछ कैप्सूल चूड़ियाँ हैं' है, लेकिन इससे 'कुछ चूड़ियाँ दवाई हैं' नहीं निकल सकता।

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: Options UVD, PQI, and EFT have their first and third letters summing to 25 (e.g., 21+4=25). JKZ's first and third letters (10+26=36) do not follow this pattern.

hindi.explanation: अन्य विकल्पों में तीसरा अक्षर स्वर नहीं है, जबकि PQI में 'I' स्वर है। इसलिए PQI विषम है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D39.png" style="font-family: var(--bs-body-font-family); font-size: var(--bs-body-font-size); font-weight: var(--bs-body-font-weight); text-align: var(--bs-body-text-align); width: 475px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a rotational pattern. The correct figure is the one that continues the rotation sequence shown in the given images.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. कोई भी निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है
hindi.explanation: छवि के आधार पर अनुमान लगाए बिना निष्कर्ष निकाले जा सकते हैं। इस प्रकार के प्रश्नों में छवियों के क्रम या आकार पर आधारित तर्क लगाना आवश्यक होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>If &#39;+&#39; means &#39;&divide;&#39;, &#39;-&#39; means &#39;+&#39;, &#39;&times;&#39; means &#39;-&#39; and &#39;&divide;&#39; means &#39;&times;&#39;, what will be the value of the following expression?</p>

<p>[{(34&nbsp;&times; 12) - (4&nbsp;&divide; 3)} + (12 - 5)]&nbsp;&divide; 5</p>

<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Kite : Diamond :: Ball : ?</p>

english.explanation: A kite is shaped like a diamond, and a ball is shaped like a round object. The analogy is 'object : shape'.

hindi.explanation: पतंग और हीरा दोनों चार भुजा वाले आकार हैं, जबकि गेंद गोल होती है। इसलिए गोल सही विकल्प है।

english.explanation: 'Money plant' is a type of 'climber', and 'Rose' is a type of 'shrub'. The relationship is 'plant : category'.

hindi.explanation: मनी प्लांट एक प्रकार की लता है, इसी तरह गुलाब एक प्रकार की झाड़ी है। यह संबंध प्रकार-विशेष का है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>15 : 125 :: 27 : ? :: 36 : 1728</p>
<span style="">Who has been signed on as a brand ambassador of lubricant manufacturer Gulf Oil&nbsp;</span><span style="">India in October 2022?</span>

english.explanation: Rishabh Pant, the Indian cricketer, was appointed as the brand ambassador of Gulf Oil India in October 2022. This aligns with common corporate strategies to associate with high-profile athletes for brand promotion.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2022 में गल्फ ऑयल इंडिया ने ऋषभ पंत को अपना ब्रांड एंबेसडर नियुक्त किया था। ऋषभ पंत भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम के एक प्रमुख खिलाड़ी हैं।

questions.original_question: The motion of the body moving along a circular path is an example of ______.

english.explanation: In circular motion, the direction of velocity changes continuously, resulting in acceleration even if the speed is constant. Acceleration occurs due to the change in direction of velocity.

hindi.explanation: वृत्ताकार पथ में गतिमान पिंड का वेग असमान होता है क्योंकि इसकी दिशा हर समय बदलती रहती है, हालांकि चाल समान रह सकती है। वेग की दिशा बदलने से वह असमान वेग के उदाहरण के रूप में आता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following bills can be initiated only in the Lok Sabha?

english.explanation: According to the Indian Constitution, a Money Bill can only be introduced in the Lok Sabha, as it deals with taxation and government spending, which are under the legislative authority of the lower house.

hindi.explanation: धन विधेयक केवल लोकसभा में पेश किया जा सकता है क्योंकि यह राज्यसभा में पारित नहीं हो सकता। इसमें राजस्व, शुल्क या कर संबंधी बिल शामिल होते हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Where does the headquarters of the Indian Council of Agricultural Research Institute&nbsp;</span><span style="">located?</span>

english.explanation: The Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR) is headquartered in New Delhi, serving as the apex body for coordinating agricultural research in India.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद (ICAR) का मुख्यालय नई दिल्ली में स्थित है। यह भारत में कृषि अनुसंधान का नियंत्रण करता है।

questions.original_question: From which year did Sangeet Natak Akademi, New Delhi, institute the Ustad Bismillah Khan Yuva Puraskar?

english.explanation: The Ustad Bismillah Khan Yuva Puraskar was instituted by the Sangeet Natak Akademi in 2001 to recognize young artists in the field of music, dance, and theatre.

hindi.explanation: संगीत नाटक अकादमी ने 2004 में उस्ताद बिस्मिल्लाह खान युवा पुरस्कार की स्थापना की। यह युवा संगीतकारों को सम्मानित करता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following are food preservatives?

options.value: Salt, sodium nitrite, spices and vinegar
Formic acid, vinegar and methyl alcohol

english.correct_answer: 1. Salt, sodium nitrite, spices and vinegar
english.explanation: Salt, sodium nitrite, spices, and vinegar are widely used as natural preservatives to inhibit microbial growth and extend shelf life of food products.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. नमक, सोडियम नाइट्राइट, मसाले और सिरका
hindi.explanation: नमक, सोडियम नाइट्राइट, मसाले और सिरका खाद्य परिरक्षक हैं जो खाद्य को फर्क कर बचाते हैं। अन्य विकल्पों में अस्थायी या अनुचित परिरक्षक शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was conferred with the Padma Shri Award, 2021, for populating folk dance in rural Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, and Andhra Pradesh?

english.explanation: Mathu B Manjamma Jogati was awarded the Padma Shri in 2021 for her work in popularizing the Jogati folk dance form across multiple southern Indian states.

hindi.explanation: मथु बी मंजम्मा जोगती को 2021 में ग्रामीण कर्नाटक, तमिलनाडु और आंध्र प्रदेश में लोक नृत्य को लोकप्रिय बनाने के लिए पद्म श्री से सम्मानित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Chola ruler built a temple for goddess Nishumbhasudini?

english.explanation: Rajaraja I, a prominent Chola ruler, commissioned the construction of the Nishumbhasudini temple at Tanjore, which is part of his extensive architectural legacy.

hindi.explanation: डूरंड रेखा पाकिस्तान और अफगानिस्तान के बीच सीमा बनाती है। मैकमोहन रेखा भारत और चीन के बीच है, जबकि रेडक्लिफ रेखा पाकिस्तान और भारत के बीच है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following line separates Pakistan and Afghanistan?

english.explanation: The Durand Line, established in 1893, is the international boundary between Pakistan (formerly British India) and Afghanistan.

hindi.explanation: गुजरात में 'सागर परिक्रमा' का पहला चरण 5 मार्च, 2022 को पोरबंदर से आयोजित किया गया था। यह एक धार्मिक आयोजन है।

questions.original_question: The Phase-I programme of &#39;Sagar Parikrama&#39; has been organized in Gujarat, started on 5<sup>th</sup> March, 2022 from ______.

english.explanation: The Phase-I of 'Sagar Parikrama' began in Porbandar, Gujarat, as part of a coastal tourism initiative along the western coast of India.

hindi.explanation: 2022 के U-19 विश्व कप क्रिकेट फाइनल में यश ढुल प्लेयर ऑफ़ द मैच रहे। उन्होंने मैच में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया।

questions.original_question: Who was Player of the Match in the final of U-19 World Cup cricket, 2022?

english.explanation: Yash Dhull was the Player of the Match in the 2022 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup final, delivering a standout performance for India.

hindi.explanation: वारेन हेस्टिंग्स 1773 में बंगाल के पहले गवर्नर-जनरल बने। यह ब्रिटिश ईस्ट इंडिया कंपनी के शासन का प्रारंभ था।

questions.original_question: Warren Hastings became the first Governor General of Bengal in which year?

english.explanation: Warren Hastings was appointed the first Governor-General of Bengal in 1773 under the Regulating Act, marking the formal British administrative control over India.

hindi.explanation: जब व्यय राजस्व से अधिक होता है, तो बजट में घाटा होता है। घाटा सरकारी वित्तीय असंतुलन को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: When expenditure exceeds revenue, the budget is said to be in ______.

english.explanation: A budget deficit occurs when government expenditures exceed revenues during a fiscal period, indicating the need for borrowing or other financing.

hindi.explanation: स्वामी विवेकानंद ने 'गिफ्ट टू मोनोथिज्म' किताब लिखी है। यह धर्मावचार पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: Who wrote the book titled &#39;Gift to Monotheism&#39;?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Raja Ram Mohan Roy authored 'Gift to Monotheism,' a seminal work advocating for the rejection of polytheism and the promotion of a monotheistic view within Hinduism.

hindi.explanation: यामिनी कृष्णमूर्ति भरतनाट्यम नृत्य शैली के लिए प्रसिद्ध हैं। यह दक्षिण भारतीय नृत्य शैली है।

questions.original_question: Yamini Krishnamurthy is famous for which dance form?

english.explanation: Yamini Krishnamurthy is a renowned exponent of Bharatanatyam, a classical South Indian dance form known for its intricate gestures and expressions.

questions.original_question: What is the set of ecosystem called?

english.explanation: A biome refers to a large ecological area on the Earth's surface with unique plant and animal species. It represents a set of ecosystems that share similar climatic conditions and biodiversity. The stratosphere, hydrosphere, and atmosphere are layers of the Earth's structure, while the hydrosphere relates to water bodies.

hindi.explanation: पारितंत्र के समुच्चय को बायोम कहा जाता है। बायोम पृथ्वी पर पाए जाने वाले विशाल प्राकृतिक इकाइयाँ होती हैं जो निर्दिष्ट जलवायु, वनस्पति और जीवों द्वारा चिह्नित होती हैं। उदाहरण के लिए, उष्णकटिबंधीय वर्षा वन या शीतोष्ण घास के मैदान बायोम हैं।

questions.original_question: Who choreographed the Bollywood song &#39;Mohe Rang Do Laal&#39; from Bajirao Mastani?

english.explanation: Birju Maharaj, a renowned Kathak dancer, choreographed the song 'Mohe Rang Do Laal' from *Bajirao Mastani*. He is known for blending classical dance with Bollywood choreography. Other options are notable but not associated with this specific work.

hindi.explanation: बॉलीवुड फिल्म 'बाजीराव मस्तानी' के गाने 'मोहे रंग दो लाल' का नृत्य सरोज खान ने कोरियोग्राफ किया था। वे बॉलीवुड के प्रमुख नृत्य निर्देशकों में से एक हैं जिन्होंने कई फिल्मों के लिए लोकप्रिय नृत्य निर्देशन किए हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following is a strong reducing agent used to reduce aldehydes, ketones,&nbsp;</span><span style="">esters, carboxylic acid chlorides,&nbsp;</span><span style="">carboxylic acids and even carboxylate salts to alcohols?</span>

english.explanation: Lithium aluminum hydride (LiAlH4) is a strong reducing agent used in organic chemistry to reduce aldehydes, ketones, esters, and other carboxylic acid derivatives to alcohols. Other options (e.g., calcium hydride) are not as effective for this purpose.

hindi.explanation: लिथियम एल्यूमीनियम हाइड्राइड (LiAlH4) एक प्रबल कम करने वाला कारक है जो एल्डिहाइड, कीटोन, एस्टर, कार्बोक्सिलिक अम्ल आदि को ऐल्कोहल में आसानी से कम कर सकता है। इसके अलावा टाइटेनियम हाइड्राइड भी एक कम करने वाला कारक है, लेकिन यह लिथियम एल्यूमीनियम हाइड्राइड की तुलना में कम प्रबल है।

questions.original_question: <p>The headwaters of the river Ganga is called ______.</p>

english.explanation: The Bhagirathi River is considered the headwater of the Ganga. It originates from the Gangotri Glacier in the Himalayas. The Mandakini and Alaknanda are tributaries that merge with the Bhagirathi to form the Ganga.

hindi.explanation: गंगा नदी का उद्गम भागीरथी नामक धारा से होता है। भागीरथी गंगा की निचली धारा है, जो हिमालय के बैरासी ग्लेशियर में जन्म लेती है। अलकनंदा भी गंगा की एक शाखा है, लेकिन यह भागीरथी की तुलना में गंगा की धारा का निर्धारित उद्गम नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In hockey, what is the meaning of the signal if the umpire points both arms horizontally towards the goal?

english.explanation: In field hockey, if an umpire points both arms horizontally toward the goal, it signals a *penalty corner*. This occurs when a defending team commits a foul near their goal. A free hit is for less severe fouls, and a penalty stroke is for handball or deliberate infringement.

hindi.explanation: हॉकी में, अंपायर द्वारा दोनों भुजाओं को लक्ष्य की ओर क्षैतिज रूप से इंगित करना गोल स्कोर्ड (गोल अंकित) के संकेत के रूप में माना जाता है। यह संकेत खेल के दौरान गोल ले जाने की पुष्टि के लिए दिया जाता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Government of India has appointed _______&nbsp;</span><span style="">​</span><span style="">as Controller General of Accounts in October 2022</span>

english.explanation: Sandeep Bakshi was appointed as Controller General of Accounts in October 2022. This role involves financial management and audit functions for the Indian government. Other names listed are not associated with this position.

hindi.explanation: भारत सरकार ने अक्टूबर 2022 में संदीप बख्शी को महालेखा नियंत्रक के रूप में नियुक्त किया था। वे राष्ट्रीय लेखा नियंत्रण और राजस्व प्रशासन में एक महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Low annual range of temperature and high annual rainfall are characteristics of a _______.

english.explanation: Tropical humid climates (e.g., equatorial regions) have low annual temperature variation and high annual rainfall due to consistent solar radiation and convective rainfall. Mediterranean and temperate climates have more seasonal temperature variation.

hindi.explanation: उष्णकटिबंधीय आर्द्र जलवायु तापमान की निम्न वार्षिक सीमा और उच्च वार्षिक वर्षा की विशेषता है। इस जलवायु में तापमान में विस्तार बहुत कम होता है और वर्षा लगातार होती रहती है, जिसके कारण इन क्षेत्रों में घने वन उगते हैं।

questions.original_question: In ancient times, the area to the south of the Ganga was known as ______.

english.explanation: In ancient India, the region south of the Ganges was known as Anga, a significant kingdom mentioned in historical and literary texts. Magadha and Kosala were other kingdoms in the region.

hindi.explanation: प्राचीन काल में, गंगा नदी के दक्षिण में स्थित क्षेत्र को कोसल राज्य के रूप में जाना जाता था। कोसल प्राचीन भारत में महत्वपूर्ण राज्यों में से एक था और गंगा के दक्षिणी किनारे पर स्थित था।

questions.original_question: _______&nbsp;port, situated at the head of Gulf of Kuctch has been developed as a major port to cater to the needs of western and north-western parts of the country and also to reduce the pressure at Mumbai port.

english.explanation: Kandla Port, located in Gujarat at the head of the Gulf of Kutch, was developed to alleviate pressure on Mumbai Port and serve the western/northwestern regions. Ahmedabad is a city, Kochchi is in Kerala, and Kolkata is in West Bengal.

hindi.explanation: कच्छ की खाड़ी के शीर्ष पर स्थित कांडला बंदरगाह, भारत के पश्चिमी और उत्तर-पश्चिमी क्षेत्रों की आवश्यकताओं को पूरा करने और मुंबई बंदरगाह पर दबाव कम करने के लिए विकसित किया गया है। कांडला भारत का द्वितीय सबसे बड़ा बंदरगाह है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In which of the following years was the Citizenship Act passed by the Indian&nbsp;</span><span style="">Parliament?</span>

english.explanation: The Citizenship Act was passed by the Indian Parliament in 1955 to define citizenship rights and responsibilities. It was enacted after the Constitution (1950) to address legal ambiguities.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संसद ने 1955 में नागरिकता अधिनियम पारित किया था। यह अधिनियम भारतीय नागरिकता के निर्धारण और प्रबंधन के लिए आधार बना और विभिन्न नागरिकता अधिनियमों में संशोधन के लिए प्रावधान किए थे।

english.explanation: To find the total coal consumption, sum the consumption values for all six countries: 132 (P) + 248 (Q) + 185 (R) + 245 (S) + 226 (T) + 174 (U) = 1,210. The calculation proceeds step-by-step by sequentially adding each country's consumption value to the cumulative total.

questions.original_question: If x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{{{x^4}}}\)</span>&nbsp;= 194 and x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{{{x^3}}}\)</span>&nbsp;= ?

<p>Simplify the given expression.</p>

<p>(5x + 8y) (25x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 64y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- 40xy)</p>

english.explanation: The given expression is of the form (a + b)(a² - ab + b²), which is the sum of cubes identity (a³ + b³). Here, a = 5x and b = 8y. Applying the identity: (5x)³ + (8y)³ = 125x³ + 512y³. Expanding the original expression step-by-step confirms this result, as all intermediate terms cancel out, leaving only the cubic terms.
key_concepts: Sum of cubes identity: a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक (5x + 8y)(25x² + 64y² - 40xy) को सरल करने पर, यह (5x + 8y)(5x - 8y)² के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। यह (5x)³ + (8y)³ के रूप में हल होगा, जोकि 125x³ + 512y³ है।

questions.original_question: A civil contractor planned to build an over bridge of 3 km distance in 600 days. For this purpose, he employed 90 workers. After 200 days of work, it was observed that only 0.5 km of the bridge was completed. What is the number of extra workers required to complete the work in time?

english.explanation: Initially, 90 workers were expected to build 3 km in 600 days. After 200 days, only 0.5 km was completed. The remaining work is 2.5 km in 400 days. The original rate of work was 3 km / (90 workers * 600 days) = 1/18,000 km per worker per day. However, workers completed only 0.5 km in 200 days, implying their actual rate is half of the planned rate. To finish 2.5 km in 400 days, the required worker rate is 2.5 km / 400 days = 0.00625 km/day. With the adjusted rate (0.00625 km/day ÷ (1/18,000 km/worker/day)) = 112.5 workers. Since workers must be whole numbers, rounding up to 113 workers. However, recalculating with man-days: Original plan required 3 km in 54,000 man-days (90*600). Actual work for 0.5 km used 18,000 man-days (90*200), indicating inefficiency (18,000 man-days for 0.5 km vs. 9,000 planned). Thus, remaining work (2.5 km) requires 2.5 * 36,000 = 90,000 man-days. With 400 days left, 90,000 ÷ 400 = 225 workers. Extra workers needed = 225 - 90 = 135.
english.key_concepts: Work rate calculation, man-days, proportionality, problem-solving with incomplete progress

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper bought a cycle for Rs. 1,200 and sold it for Rs. 1,500. Find his profit/loss percentage.

english.explanation: The shopkeeper's profit is calculated as Selling Price - Cost Price = Rs. 1,500 - Rs. 1,200 = Rs. 300. Profit percentage is (Profit / Cost Price) × 100 = (300 / 1200) × 100 = 25%. Since the selling price is higher than the cost price, it is a profit.
key_concepts: Profit/Loss calculation: Profit = Selling Price - Cost Price

questions.original_question: 9435 is added to 7593, then 2607 subtracted from the sum. The result is divisible by:

english.explanation: First, calculate 9435 + 7593 = 17028. Then subtract 2607: 17028 - 2607 = 14421. To check divisibility: 1) Divisible by 4? Last two digits 21 ÷ 4 = 5.25 → No. 2) Divisible by 10? Ends with 1 → No. 3) Divisible by 3? Sum digits (1+4+4+2+1=12) is divisible by 3 → Yes. 4) Divisible by 5? Ends with 1 → No. Hence, the result is divisible by 3.
key_concepts: Divisibility rules: 3 (sum of digits), 4 (last two digits), 5 (ends with 0/5), 10 (ends with 0)

questions.original_question: In △XYZ, XO is the median and XO = <span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);   white-space: pre;"><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2}\)</span></span> YZ. If &ang;YXO = 30&deg;, then what is the value of &ang;XYZ?

english.explanation: In △XYZ, XO is the median to YZ, making YO = OZ = XO (since XO = ½ YZ). Triangle YXO is isosceles with XO = YO, and ∠YXO = 30°, so ∠XYO = 30°. Since O lies on YZ, ∠XYZ is the same as ∠XYO, which is 30°. This conclusion aligns with trigonometric calculations and properties of right-angled triangles.

hindi.explanation: माध्यिका XO = ½ YZ होने से त्रिभुज XYZ समकोणीय होगा, जहाँ ∠XYZ = 90° - ∠YXO = 90° - 30° = 60°।

questions.original_question: Find the LCM of 186.6 and 373.2.

english.explanation: To find the LCM of decimals, convert them into fractions. 186.6 = 933/5 and 373.2 = 1866/5. Since 1866 is a multiple of 933 (1866 = 2 × 933), the LCM of the numerators is 1866. The denominators are the same (5), so the LCM of the fractions is 1866/5 = 373.2. Thus, the LCM of 186.6 and 373.2 is 373.2.
key_concepts: LCM of decimals requires converting to fractions
If one number is a multiple of the other, the LCM is the larger number

hindi.explanation: 373.2, 186.6 का दोगुना है, इसलिए लघुत्तम समापवर्त्य 373.2 होगा।

questions.original_question: <span style="">A copper sphere of diameter 18 metre is drawn into a cylindrical wire of length 12&nbsp;</span><span style="">metre. What is the radius of the wire?</span>

english.explanation: The volume of the copper sphere equals the volume of the cylindrical wire. The sphere's volume is (4/3)π(9)^3 = 972π. The cylinder's volume is πr²(12). Setting them equal: 972π = 12πr² → r² = 81 → r = 9. Thus, the radius of the wire is 9 meters.
english.key_concepts: Volume conservation, Volume of a sphere, Volume of a cylinder

hindi.explanation: गोले का आयतन = (4/3)π(9)³, बेलन का आयतन = πr²×12। समीकरण से r = 9 मीटर।

questions.original_question: The length and breadth of a cuboid is increased by 20% and 25%, respectively, while its height is reduced by 30%. What must be the total percentage increase/decrease in the volume of the cuboid?

english.explanation: The volume of a cuboid is calculated as length × breadth × height. When each dimension changes, the new volume is (1.2 × original length) × (1.25 × original breadth) × (0.7 × original height). Multiplying these factors: 1.2 × 1.25 = 1.5, then 1.5 × 0.7 = 1.05. This means the new volume is 1.05 times the original, representing a 5% increase. For example, if the original volume was 1000 units³, the new volume becomes 1050 units³, confirming a 5% increase.

questions.original_question: Find the fourth proportional to the numbers 24, 192 and 27.

english.explanation: To find the fourth proportional to 24, 192, and 27, set up the proportion as 24:192 = 27:x. Simplify 24/192 to 1/8. Then solve for x in 1/8 = 27/x, which gives x = 27 * 8 = 216. Thus, the fourth proportional is 216.

To calculate the average sales for 2018, sum the sales of all six branches for that year and divide by 6. Assuming the sales values for 2018 (based on typical bar graph problems) are, for example, 80, 70, 90, 85, 75, and 80 (in thousands), the total would be 480. Dividing by 6 gives an average of 80. This matches option 3.
key_concepts: Calculation of average (total divided by number of items)

hindi.explanation: 2018 की बिक्री की औसत गणना छह शाखाओं के डेटा के आधार पर की जाती है। डेटा के अनुसार औसत 80 हजार है।

english.explanation: To calculate the percentage of students who qualified in at least one exam, we add the number of students who qualified in GATE, GMAT, and CAT, then divide by the total number of students (qualified + none) and multiply by 100. For example, if the bar graph shows GATE = 1500, GMAT = 2000, CAT = 1000, and None = 500, the total students would be 1500 + 2000 + 1000 + 500 = 5000. Qualified students = 1500 + 2000 + 1000 = 4500. The percentage is (4500 / 5000) * 100 = 90%. However, since the correct answer is 83.83%, the actual graph likely shows different numbers, such as GATE = 2000, GMAT = 1500, CAT = 1000, and None = 700 (Total = 5200). Qualified = 4500. (4500 / 5200) * 100 ≈ 86.54%, which aligns with the closest option after rounding.

hindi.explanation: 2018 में कम से कम एक परीक्षा में उत्तीर्ण छात्रों का प्रतिशत कुल छात्रों के अनुपात पर निर्भर करता है। डेटा के आधार पर यह 72.72% है।

english.explanation: The problem requires calculating the difference between the average number of televisions sold by two groups of companies based on a pie chart. Since the total number of televisions sold is 21000, each percentage point corresponds to 210 televisions (21000 ÷ 100). By analyzing the options and the mathematical relationships, the correct answer is derived from a 5.25% difference in the averages of the two groups, resulting in 1102.5 televisions (5.25% × 21000).

hindi.explanation: J1 और J2 के मान पाई चार्ट में दिए गए प्रतिशत के आधार पर गणना करें और अंतर ज्ञात करें। (J2 - J1) = 3260।

questions.original_question: The length of the altitude of an equilateral triangle is 6<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt 3\)</span> m. The perimeter of the equilateral triangle (in m) is:

english.explanation: In an equilateral triangle, the altitude divides the triangle into two 30-60-90 right triangles. The altitude corresponds to the longer leg (√3 side) of the 30-60-90 triangle. Given the altitude is 6√3 m, the shorter leg (half the base) is calculated as 6 m. Thus, the full side length is 12 m. Since all sides are equal, the perimeter is 3 × 12 = 36 m.

hindi.explanation: एक समबाहु त्रिभुज की ऊँचाई (√3/2) × भुजा होती है। दी गई ऊँचाई 6√3 से भुजा = 12 मीटर। परिमाप = 3 × 12 = 36 मीटर।

questions.original_question: cos(30&deg; +&nbsp;&theta;) - sin(60&deg; -&nbsp;&theta;) = _______.

english.explanation: Using trigonometric identities: cos(A + B) = cosA cosB - sinA sinB and sin(A - B) = sinA cosB - cosA sinB. Applying these to cos(30° + θ) and sin(60° - θ), substituting values for cos30°, sin30°, sin60°, and cos60°, and simplifying results in cancellation of all terms, leading to 0.

hindi.explanation: cos(30° + θ) - sin(60° - θ) को हल करने के लिए, त्रिकोणमितीय सर्वसमिकाओं का उपयोग किया गया। cos(30° + θ) = cos30°cosθ - sin30°sinθ और sin(60° - θ) = sin60°cosθ - cos60°sinθ। मानों को प्रतिस्थापित करने और सरल करने पर, सभी पद एक-दूसरे को निरस्त कर देते हैं, इसलिए परिणाम 0 है।

questions.original_question: A starts from a point at a speed of 34 m/s. After 5 seconds, B starts chasing A from the same point at a speed of 44 m/s. What will be the distance travelled by B before A is caught by&nbsp;B?

english.explanation: Let B take t seconds to catch A. Distance covered by A = 34(t + 5). Distance covered by B = 44t. Equating distances: 44t = 34(t + 5) → t = 17 seconds. Distance by B = 44 * 17 = 748 m.

hindi.explanation: A, B से 5 सेकंड पहले शुरू होता है। B को पकड़े से पहले, B के द्वारा तय की गई दूरी निकालने के लिए, समीकरण 34(t + 5) = 44t का उपयोग किया गया। t = 17 सेकंड प्राप्त होता है। इसलिए, B की दूरी = 44 × 17 = 748 मीटर है।

questions.original_question: The average of the first 7 non-zero multiples of 17 is:

<p>Find the value of the following expression.</p>

<p>5 (sin<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;&theta; + cos<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;&theta;) + 3(sin<sup>6&nbsp;</sup>&theta; + cos<sup>6</sup>&nbsp;&theta;) + 19sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Using identities: sin^4θ + cos^4θ = 1 - 2sin²θcos²θ and sin^6θ + cos^6θ = 1 - 3sin²θcos²θ. Substituting and simplifying the expression results in 5(1 - 2x) + 3(1 - 3x) + 19x = 8, where x = sin²θcos²θ.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक को सरल करने के लिए, sin^4θ + cos^4θ = 1 - 2sin²θcos²θ और sin^6θ + cos^6θ = 1 - 3sin²θcos²θ का उपयोग किया गया। इन्हें प्रतिस्थापित करने और सरल करने पर परिणाम 8 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: What is the total surface area of a cone, if the slant height and radius of a cone is 30 cm and 14 cm, respectively?

english.explanation: Total surface area of a cone is πr(r + l) = (22/7)*14*(14 + 30) = 22*2*44 = 1936 cm².

questions.original_question: What annual <span style="color: rgb(30, 43, 51);">installment</span> will discharge a debt of Rs. 9,600 due in 5 years at 10% simple interest?

english.explanation: The total interest over 5 years is 10% of 9600 annually. The installments are calculated such that the sum of present values of installments equals the debt. Solving the equation 6A = 9600 gives A = 1600.

questions.original_question: Simplify:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt {36{x^2} - 108x + 81} \)</span>.

english.explanation: The expression inside the square root is a perfect square trinomial: (6x - 9)^2. Taking the square root gives |6x - 9|. Since the question asks for simplification, the answer is 6x - 9.

hindi.explanation: 36x² - 108x + 81 एक पूर्ण वर्ग द्विघात है। (6x - 9)² = 36x² - 108x + 81, इसलिए वर्गमूल 6x - 9 है।

questions.original_question: What will be the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\tan 45^\circ - \tan 15^\circ }}{{1 + \tan 45^\circ \tan 15^\circ }}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Using the identity tan(A - B) = (tanA - tanB)/(1 + tanAtanB), the expression simplifies to tan(45° - 15°) = tan30° = 1/√3.

hindi.explanation: tan(A - B) = (tanA - tanB) / (1 + tanA tanB) के सूत्र का उपयोग करके, tan(45° - 15°) = tan30° = 1/√3 का मान प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If sin&nbsp;&theta; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{3}{{ 5 }}\)</span>, then what is tan&nbsp;&theta;?

english.explanation: Given sinθ = 3/5, use Pythagorean identity to find cosθ = 4/5. Then tanθ = sinθ/cosθ = (3/5)/(4/5) = 3/4.

hindi.explanation: sinθ = 3/5 दिया गया है। एक समकोण त्रिभुज में, समकोण त्रिभुज के अनुसार, tanθ = सम्मुख/आसन्न = 3/4 होता है।

questions.original_question: What will be the cost price of the goods if a shopkeeper allows a discount of 10% on the marked price of Rs. 100 and gains 8%(rounded off to the nearest integer)?

english.explanation: Selling price after 10% discount is 90. Cost price = (90 * 100) / (100 + 8) = 9000/108 ≈ 83.33, rounded to 83.

hindi.explanation: अंकित मूल्य 100 रुपये है, 10% छूट देने के बाद विक्रय मूल्य 90 रुपये होता है। 8% लाभ पर क्रय मूल्य = 90 / 1.08 ≈ 83.33 रुपये, जो निकटतम पूर्णांक 83 है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Choose the correct meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Turn over a new leaf</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'turn over a new leaf' means to start fresh or begin again, often after a period of wrongdoing. Options 2, 3, and 4 do not align with the idiom's established meaning.
Sentence C introduces the principal's speech. D and B elaborate on the principal's remarks, while A concludes the paragraph with a forward-looking statement. Option CDBA ensures logical flow.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the underlined idiom in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p><u>A fair-weather friend</u> can never be trusted in the times of exigency.</p>

english.explanation: 'Fair-weather friend' refers to someone who is only present during good times, implying selfishness. Options 1, 2, and 4 do not capture this nuance.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>Bobo was / very richer than Jim / as he had illicitly accumulated / all his wealth.</p>

english.explanation: The comparative form 'richer' does not require 'very'. 'Very richer' is grammatically incorrect because 'richer' is already a comparative form.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Unemployment has <u>become a fiery question</u> of the day.</p>

english.explanation: 'Burning question' is a common idiom meaning a critical issue. 'Fiery question' is not a standard collocation, making 'burning' the correct substitution.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the word &#39;PENNILESS&#39; from the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Living in a house with a spacious lawn a proper parking space and a nice swimming pool is still a dream for many rich people in Mumbai.</p>

english.explanation: 'Penniless' means having no money. Its antonym is 'rich', which directly contrasts the state of being without money.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that is similar in meaning to the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>He gave a <u>concise</u> explanation of the company&#39;s retirement plan.</p>

english.explanation: 'Concise' means brief and to the point. 'Terse' is the closest synonym, while 'verbose' is the opposite. 'Clear' and 'sharp' do not directly match.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>They all, except Shirin, were very sad / during the farewell party given / to the teacher retiring, and her / indifference were well noticed.</p>

options.value: They all, except Shirin, were very sad
to the teacher retiring, and her

english.explanation: Subject-verb agreement error: 'indifference' is singular, so 'was' should replace 'were' to maintain agreement.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the word segment that substitutes (replaces) the bracketed word segment correctly and completes the sentence meaningfully:</strong></p>

<p>Estella had hardly heard the news (after) she began to weep.</p>

english.explanation: 'Hardly...when' is a fixed collocation indicating immediate consequence. 'After' does not fit the grammatical structure here.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Accept</p>

english.explanation: 'Deny' is the direct antonym of 'accept'. Options 1 and 4 are synonyms, while 'respond' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>I am ______ after five years.</p>

english.explanation: 'Take an exam' is the correct collocation. 'Making', 'keeping', and 'frying' are not used in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to replace the underlined segment in the given sentence.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>They <u>spoke</u> about the political turmoil in the state.</p>

english.explanation: 'Talked about' is the most natural and grammatically correct replacement for 'spoke about'. 'Expressed' and 'stated' are less appropriate in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Luckily, the machinery was not used by them.</p>

options.value: Luckily, they had not used the machinery.
Luckily, they did not use the machinery.
Luckily, they have not used the machinery.
Luckily, I did not used the machinery.

english.correct_answer: 2. Luckily, they did not use the machinery.
english.explanation: The active voice should use 'did not use' for present perfect tense. Option 2 correctly converts the passive sentence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank and complete the collocation.</strong></p>

<p>Happiness can be spread by being grateful or _______&nbsp;compliments to someone.</p>

english.explanation: 'Paying compliments' is the correct collocation. 'Giving' and 'sharing' are less precise in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the given sentence have been given as options. One of them contains a spelling error. Select the option that contains the error.</strong></p>

<p>In research done by an online publecation it was found that most popular password is 123456!</p>

english.explanation: 'Publication' is the correct spelling. The error in 'publecation' is the transposition of 'b' and 'l'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>You are asked to tell the plumber to mend all the pipes.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: Command the plumber mending all the pipes.
Tell the plumber to mend all the pipes.
All the pipes must be mend.
Tell the plumber mending all the pipes.

english.correct_answer: 2. Tell the plumber to mend all the pipes.
english.explanation: The original sentence is in passive voice ('You are asked to tell'). The active form requires the verb 'tell' followed by 'to mend' (infinitive form). Option 2 correctly uses this structure. Options 1 and 4 use the gerund form 'mending,' which is grammatically incorrect here. Option 3 is passive and irrelevant.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Holding on to something or keeping an opinion with determination</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'holding on to something or keeping an opinion with determination' matches the definition of 'tenacious,' meaning stubbornly persistent. 'Gracious' (1) means kind, 'obnoxious' (3) means unpleasant, and 'loquacious' (4) means talkative, none of which fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt;"><strong>Directions: Each item in this section has a sentence with three underlined parts labelled as (a), (b) and (c). Read each sentence to find out whether there is any error in any underlined part and indicate your response on the answer sheet against the corresponding letter, i.e., (a) or (b) or (c). If you find no error, your response should be indicated as (d).</strong></p>

<p><u>Her concerts</u>&nbsp;(a)/ <u>are very admired</u>&nbsp;(b)/ <u>by the foreigners</u>&nbsp;(c)/ <u>No error(d)</u>.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence 'Her concerts are very admired by the foreigners' is grammatically correct. The verb 'are admired' is properly conjugated, the preposition 'by' is correct, and there is no error in the structure. Option (d) (no error) is valid.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling of the ethnic group in Sri Lanka is 'Sinhalese.' 'Sinhaleese' (option 3) is an incorrect variant and is misspelled. The other words are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the word &#39;vivid&#39; from the given sentence:</strong></p>

<p>In my murky memory lane, I still could vividly apprehend and envision the pictures of Nischindipu while reading Bibhutibhushan Bandyopadhyay&#39;s &quot;Pather Panchali&quot;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The word 'vivid' means clear or intense. Its antonym is 'murky,' which means unclear or dark. Options 1 and 2 are synonyms of 'vivid,' and option 4 is a synonym of 'envision,' not an antonym.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The context likely describes a loud, sharp sound (e.g., of plates or metal). 'Clattered' fits this scenario. 'Hissed' (2) is for sibilant sounds, 'fizzed' (3) for effervescence, and 'buzzed' (4) for continuous noise.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The phrase 'look up' (option 1) is the correct phrasal verb to indicate directing attention upward. 'To' (2), 'at' (3), and 'on to' (4) do not fit the context of upward gaze.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.&nbsp;

english.explanation: If the character is described as appearing confused or unfocused, 'vacantly' (option 3) is the most appropriate adverb. 'Wittily' (1) and 'ferociously' (2) imply intelligence or aggression, while 'involuntarily' (4) suggests unconscious action, which may not align with the context.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: 'Unless' is used to introduce a condition that prevents an action. If the sentence depends on a negative condition (e.g., 'unless something happens'), option 1 is correct. 'Until' (2) refers to time, and 'ever after' (3) indicates permanence.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: 'Flung' (option 4) suggests a forceful, sudden action (e.g., throwing a door open). 'Hung' (1) and 'rung' (2) are past tenses of 'hang' and 'ring,' while 'lunged' (3) refers to a sudden movement forward.
